Module MichelleMastersC195
Package controller

Class AppointmentEditController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.AppointmentEditController
  • public class AppointmentEditController
extends java.lang.Object
    controller for 'AppointmentEditScreen.fxml' controls the appointment tables and the buttons to edit, delete appointments also controls the form for adding and editing appointments, including the save and clear buttons provides exit back to main appointment screen

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void clearApptAddEdit()
      clears all of the text fields and combo boxes of the edit form
      void initializeAddEditAppt()
      initializes the add or edit form for appointments, including setting combo boxes and business times available
      static void loadAddEditAppt​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      loads the Appointment Edit scene, including calling to load the appointments table and the form
      void loadAppointmentsTable()
      this performs the initial load of the main appointments table, grabbing the appt data from the database
      void OnApptClearButton()
      clears the form by calling clearApptAddEdit()
      (package private) void OnApptEditScreenExit​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      reloads the main appointment scene upon the user clicking the Exit button
      (package private) void OnApptSaveButton()
      saves the appointment with the information that is in the edit form to the database and displays in the tableview checks for any conflicting customer appointments before saving and shows error message, if there is overlap (StartDate1 <= EndDate2) and (StartDate2 <= EndDate1)
      (package private) void OnDeleteApptButton()
      deletes a selected appointment if one is selected and the user confirms that they want to delete otherwise informs the user to select an appointment in order to delete an appointment
      (package private) void OnEditApptButton()
      loads the appointment selected into the edit form on the right if an appointment is selected otherwise throws an error dialog to instruct the user to select an appointment first

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • loadAddEditAppt

        public static void loadAddEditAppt​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        loads the Appointment Edit scene, including calling to load the appointments table and the form
        Parameters:
        event - provided by the calling button on another scene
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - back to the caller if there is a loading error

      • loadAppointmentsTable

        public void loadAppointmentsTable()
        this performs the initial load of the main appointments table, grabbing the appt data from the database

      • initializeAddEditAppt

        public void initializeAddEditAppt()
        initializes the add or edit form for appointments, including setting combo boxes and business times available

      • OnEditApptButton

        void OnEditApptButton()
        loads the appointment selected into the edit form on the right if an appointment is selected otherwise throws an error dialog to instruct the user to select an appointment first

      • OnDeleteApptButton

        void OnDeleteApptButton()
        deletes a selected appointment if one is selected and the user confirms that they want to delete otherwise informs the user to select an appointment in order to delete an appointment

      • OnApptSaveButton

        void OnApptSaveButton()
        saves the appointment with the information that is in the edit form to the database and displays in the tableview checks for any conflicting customer appointments before saving and shows error message, if there is overlap (StartDate1 <= EndDate2) and (StartDate2 <= EndDate1)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • OnApptClearButton

        public void OnApptClearButton()
        clears the form by calling clearApptAddEdit()

      • clearApptAddEdit

        public void clearApptAddEdit()
        clears all of the text fields and combo boxes of the edit form

      • OnApptEditScreenExit

        void OnApptEditScreenExit​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        reloads the main appointment scene upon the user clicking the Exit button
        Parameters:
        event - passed to load the main appointment scene
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is an input output issue
